metadata.title: Filip Jagodič — Music Beyond All Boundaries
metadata.description: Filip Jagodič is an extraordinary musician with perfect pitch who transcends all obstacles. Discover his incredible story and music.
metadata.ogDescription: Discover an extraordinary musician with perfect pitch.

hero.srOnly: Filip Jagodič — Music Beyond All Boundaries
hero.quote: “The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched — they must be felt with the heart”

about.heading: About Filip
about.story: Filip Jagodič was born after severe complications in the fifth month of pregnancy. Despite blindness, cerebral palsy, and autism, he developed an extraordinary musical talent — 100% perfect pitch. By the age of one, he was already singing melodies, and when he got a toy with keys, he began playing everything he heard.
about.blockquote: “No one teaches me. I learned everything by myself.”

absolutePitch.title: Perfect Pitch
absolutePitch.description: Filip can identify and reproduce any tone without reference. He can instantly play and sing any song he hears — he learns everything on his own.

memory.title: Incredible Memory
memory.description: He can memorize thousands of song lyrics in different languages and reproduce them without a single mistake.

noStageFright.title: No Stage Fright
noStageFright.description: "I have no stage fright, I'm not afraid. I can't see the people." Filip's directness and honesty captivate everyone who meets him.

encyclopedia.title: Musical Encyclopedia
encyclopedia.description: He knows the authors, performers, and stories behind songs of all genres and eras. He covers everything, but prefers older songs the most.

bio.heading: Filip Jagodič
bio.pageDescription: The full life story of Filip Jagodič — from birth to today.
bio.ch1p1: Filip's mother Andreja had wished for a child since she was twenty, but her wish only came true at thirty-one. The pregnancy was normal until the fifth month, and even three days before birth the ultrasound showed no abnormalities. Then her water suddenly broke.
bio.ch1p2: Filip Jagodič was born in the fifth month of pregnancy by cesarean section — without it, neither he nor his mother would have survived. At birth he weighed just 600 grams. He cried softly, like a tiny kitten, and was immediately placed on artificial respiration. He was tiny, with a peculiar little head, and his skin was so thin you could see his heart and lungs.
bio.ch1q: “We waited for him to cry, and he did — he cried softly, like a tiny kitten.”
bio.ch2p1: Filip's path was extraordinarily challenging from the very beginning. First they discovered blindness. Then cerebral palsy. At age three, he was also diagnosed with autism — Asperger's syndrome. Each diagnosis was a new blow, but mother Andreja went through all the stages of acceptance and decided to give her son the best possible life.
bio.ch3p1: For twelve years they drove him to therapy in Zagreb, where they fitted him with braces to try to get him on his feet — but it didn't work. His mother exercised with him every day for five hours. Others were swimming in the sea, while we were doing exercises — she said. For ten years she drove him five times a week from Laško to Ljubljana to the Institute for the Blind and Visually Impaired. On the way he would sometimes have an asthma attack and she would stand in the middle of the road.
bio.ch3q: “I exercised with him every day for five hours. Others were swimming in the sea, while we were doing exercises.”
bio.ch4p1: Sadly, Filip's father is no longer with us — he passed away when the little boy was only eight years old. To this day, Filip goes to bed the same way every evening, with three kisses — a kiss for mommy, a kiss for daddy, and a kiss from Filip for both.
bio.ch5p1: By the age of one, Filip began singing songs — without words, but with flawless melody. When he got a toy with keys, his true musical journey began. Filip started playing everything he heard. No one taught him — he learned everything himself, with 100% perfect pitch.
bio.ch5q: “No one teaches me. I learned everything by myself.”
bio.ch5p2: Today, Filip knows thousands of songs — from jazz standards of the 1920s, chansons and pop songs from the 50s and 60s, to modern hits. He can instantly reproduce any song he hears on keyboards and sing it with all the voices. He also has the extraordinary ability to sing a song backwards — reversing both the lyrics and melody entirely. In the recording studio, he can record over 30 songs in a single session.
bio.ch6p1: Autistic people are obsessed with order. Every toy must be in its place, every synthesizer he has been collecting for 15 years must be exactly where it belongs. His perfectionism is a consequence of autism — Filip recognizes many Slovenian songs that are plagiarized and tells the musicians straight to their face. That's who he is: honest, direct.
bio.ch6q: “I believe his perfectionism is a consequence of autism. Filip recognizes many Slovenian songs that are plagiarized.”
bio.ch6p2: With his abilities, Filip is reminiscent of one of the most famous autistic musicians in the world — Derek Paravicini, a blind British pianist who has also performed at Cankarjev dom in Ljubljana. Both are proof that autism and blindness are not obstacles, but doors to an extraordinary musical world.
bio.ch7p1: Filip has recorded three CDs and has had numerous concerts throughout Slovenia. He has no stage fright — as he says: “I have no stage fright, I'm not afraid. I can't see the people.” This directness is part of his energy that captivates everyone who meets him — from ordinary listeners to the biggest stars, like Andrea Bocelli.
bio.ch8p1: Behind Filip stands his devoted mother Andreja Pader. She survived cancer twice, nearly died from a blocked abdominal aorta, but never gave up. She worked as a doctor while simultaneously caring for Filip. For twelve years she traveled to Zagreb for her son's therapy. She devoted all her time and energy to him. Today she herself needs help — her health problems are a consequence of years of caregiving, but her fight for Filip never stops.
bio.ch8q: “My life turned upside down in an instant; before I wanted a career, I took care of animals, and overnight I became just a mother. And my husband overnight lost his wife, which I also mourn.”
bio.ch8p2: Andreja is also one of the most vocal critics of the personal assistance system in Slovenia. She fights against shortcomings in legislation and the indifference of commissions that decide on the rights of children with special needs. Her fight is not just for Filip — but for all families who find themselves in a similar situation.
bio.ch8p3: Together they are an unstoppable team — Filip with his talent, Andreja with boundless love and determination.
bio.ch9p1: Besides music, Filip has another great passion — he collects synthesizers and dictaphones. His collection includes more than 20 keyboards, and he knows each one inside out, while his room houses around 2,000 CDs. His biggest wish remains the Yamaha Tyros 5 — a professional keyboard that would open new musical worlds for him.
bio.ch9p2: Filip requires 24-hour personal assistance. Three assistants — Jernej, Dejan, and Rok — help him in his daily life. Jernej and Filip are like twins, Dejan is the computer expert, and Rok helps out in the field. Without them, Filip's life wouldn't be what it is.
bio.ch9p3: Every evening Filip goes to bed the same way, with three kisses. His world is orderly, full of music and love. And although life with him is demanding, Filip is proof that talent knows no boundaries.

encounters.heading: Encounters
encounters.subtitle: Filip has impressed many famous musicians with his talent and directness — each encounter is a story of its own.
encounters.pageDescription: All of Filip's encounters with famous personalities — from Andrea Bocelli to Slovenian stars.

bocelli.name: Andrea Bocelli
bocelli.description: Filip played and sang for Andrea Bocelli, who praised his performance with an enthusiastic "bravisimo" and kept the USB stick with the recording.
bocelli.fullStory: One of the greatest encounters in Filip's life took place in Ljubljana, when he had the opportunity to play and sing before the legendary tenor Andrea Bocelli. Filip was completely relaxed — as always, without any stage fright or fear. Bocelli listened attentively to his performance and praised it with an enthusiastic "bravisimo". He was so impressed that he kept Filip's USB stick with the recording as a memento. A moment that Filip and his family will never forget.

sufit.name: Klapa Šufit
sufit.description: Filip performed together with the Croatian klapa Šufit and captivated the audience with his directness and musical talent.
sufit.fullStory: Filip stepped on stage together with members of the Croatian klapa Šufit and proved that music truly knows no boundaries. Despite being the youngest on stage, he captivated the entire audience with his directness and talent. The klapa members were amazed by his ear and ability to instantly adapt.

plestenjak.name: Jan Plestenjak
plestenjak.description: A meeting with one of the most popular Slovenian musicians, who was deeply impressed by Filip's sincerity and talent.
plestenjak.fullStory: When Filip met Jan Plestenjak, one of the most popular Slovenian musicians, he stayed true to his character — direct and sincere. Plestenjak was deeply impressed by Filip's talent, especially his ability to instantly reproduce any song he hears on keyboards.

pahor.name: Borut Pahor
pahor.description: Filip impressed the former President of Slovenia Borut Pahor with his talent.
pahor.fullStory: Filip impressed the former President of Slovenia Borut Pahor with his talent. Full story coming soon.

zavec.name: Dejan Zavec
zavec.description: A meeting of two fighters — Filip with his challenges, Dejan in the ring. Both champions.
zavec.fullStory: A meeting of two fighters — Filip with his challenges, Dejan in the ring. Both champions. Full story coming soon.

svajger.name: Darja Švajger
svajger.description: Filip also met opera singer Darja Švajger, who was impressed by his extraordinary ear for music.
svajger.fullStory: Filip also met opera singer Darja Švajger, who was impressed by his extraordinary ear for music. Full story coming soon.

slabinac.name: Kičo Slabinac
slabinac.description: Filip met legendary Croatian singer Kičo Slabinac, who was impressed by his talent.
slabinac.fullStory: Filip met legendary Croatian singer Kičo Slabinac, who was impressed by his talent. Full story coming soon.

smolar.name: Adi Smolar
smolar.description: Filip met Slovenian singer-songwriter Adi Smolar, who was impressed by his talent.
smolar.fullStory: Filip met Slovenian singer-songwriter Adi Smolar, who was impressed by his talent. Full story coming soon.

kesovija.name: Tereza Kesovija
kesovija.description: Filip met legendary Croatian singer Tereza Kesovija and sang a song with her.
kesovija.fullStory: Filip met legendary Croatian singer Tereza Kesovija and sang a song with her. Full story coming soon.

studio.heading: In the Studio
studio.subtitle: The studio in Trebnje is Filip's second home. Besides singing at home, he loves being here the most, where recordings, CDs, and unforgettable moments are made.
studio.storyP1: When Filip steps into the studio, the real show begins. He does everything exclusively by touch — he plays keyboards and sings simultaneously, without sheet music, without preparation. He nails 99% of songs on the first take. In a single recording session, he can record over 30 songs.
studio.storyP2: There's a lot of joking in the studio — Filip loves speaking in English (just for fun) and the atmosphere is always relaxed. But when he presses a key and opens his mouth, every recording is pure magic.
studio.storyP3: Filip has also recorded several duets. With Barbara Leben, he recorded the original song Privid, and with Agnes Kumlanc an energetic cover of Prsti zapleteni. A special duet was with blind girl Mija Koritnik — two voices, the same sensitivity for music. He also sang with Jernej Golob, one of his assistants.
studio.albumsSubtitle: Filip has recorded three CDs. They are available in physical format or on a USB drive.

collections.heading: Collections
collections.subtitle: Filip is a collector of keyboards and dictaphones — he has more than 20 keyboards and numerous dictaphones. Each one has its own character, which Filip knows inside out.

yamaha.name: Yamaha PSR-S975
yamaha.description: Professional performance keyboard with a rich sound bank.

sony.name: Sony ICD-UX570
sony.description: Compact digital dictaphone with an excellent microphone.

korg.name: Korg PA1000
korg.description: Advanced arranger keyboard with realistic sounds.

contact.heading: Contact
contact.subtitle: For performances, collaborations, media inquiries, or just a simple message — we'd love to connect.
